skill_xml_basics_desc: XML definition, goals and applications, file structure, well-formedness rules
skill_xml_structure_desc: Elements, attributes, tags, creating valid documents
skill_namespaces_desc: XMLNS - application and implementation of namespaces
skill_xml_tools_desc: Working with XML editors, e.g. Liquid XML Studio
skill_dtd_desc: Introduction to DTD, declaring elements and attributes
skill_advanced_dtd_desc: Entities in DTD, FPI (Formal Public Identifier), practical applications
skill_xml_schema_desc: Defining XML document structure using XSD
skill_xpath_desc: Navigating and querying nodes in XML documents
skill_xslt_desc: Transforming XML documents into other formats
skill_xml_validation_desc: Validating XML documents using DTD and XSD
skill_cdata_desc: Using CDATA sections in XML documents
skill_xml_linking_desc: Advanced linking techniques in XML documents
skill_xml_security_desc: Digital signatures and encryption in XML documents
skill_canonical_xml_desc: Standardization of XML documents for comparisons and security
